name: WP Webhooks – Easy Digital Downloads
author: Ironikus

sections.description:
This plugin extends the possibilities of WP Webhooks and WP Webhooks Pro by integrating Easy Digital Downloads.
This extension is also available within the web view of our plugin.
For a full list of features, please check out the list down below:

Features

Triggers
* Send Data On New Download
* Send Data On Download Update
* Send Data On Download Deletion
* Send Data On File Download
* Send Data On New Customer
* Send Data On Customer Update
* Send Data On New Payment
* Send Data On Deleted Payment
* Send Data On any Payment Status
* Send Data On Custom Payment Status
* Send Data On New Susbcription
* Send Data On Any Subscription Status
* Send Data On Renewal Payment
* Send Data On License Creation
* Send Data On License Activation
* Send Data On License Deactivation
* Send Data On any License Status Change

Actions
* Create Downloads
* Update Downloads
* Delete Downloads
* Create Customer
* Update Customer
* Delete Customer
* Create Payment
* Update Payment
* Delete Payment
* Create Discount Code
* Update Discount Code
* Delete Discount Code
* Create Subscription
* Update Subscription
* Delete Subscription
* Create License
* Update License
* Renew License
* Delete License

You can also check out our landing page for a better readability

For devs

Feel free to message us in case you want special features – We love to help!
sections.installation:
We have a full installation guide for our plugin available: Click here

  1. Upload the zip file to your WordPress site (Plugins > Add New > Upload)
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Go to Settings > WP Webhooks Pro -> Settings
  4. Scroll down, activate the specified actions and click Save
  5. Go to “Receive Data” and start implementing the webhook
sections.changelog:
1.0.1: May 02, 2021

  • Feature: Add support for the EDD Per Product Emails
  • Feature: Full compatibility with all new standards of WP Webhooks 3.1.0 and WP Webhooks 4.1.0
  • Tweak: Remove unnecessary variable output
  • Tweak optimize descriptions
  • Fix: The edd_create_payment action order status fired at a wrong positiion, causing certain orders to not return the correct price within the response

1.0.0: July 29, 2020

  • Birthday of WP Webhooks – Easy Digital Downloads
